name: wiping
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
wipe
B2 to slide something, especially a piece of cloth, over the surface of something else, in order to remove dirt, food, or liquid: Do you have some paper towels that I can wipe the floor with? I'll just get a sponge and wipe the crumbs off the table. Don't wipe your nose on your sleeve! Someone has wiped their dirty hands on my nice clean towel!
